thread.title: TV for people who use their minds Why losing MythBusters wont be easy
thread.title_full: TV for people who use their minds Why losing MythBusters wont be easy

title: TV for people who use their minds Why losing MythBusters wont be easy
text:
TV for people who use their minds: Why losing 'MythBusters' won't be easy 
Cnet Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Commentary: The popular series will say goodbye in 2016. CNET's Bonnie Burton, a longtime fan and science nerd, explains why she's "already feeling empty inside" -- and why TV will never be the same....
